text: Saint-Jean is a village and former municipality in the district of Sierre in the canton of Switzerland. On 1 January 2009 the former municipalities of Saint-Jean, Ayer, Chandolin, Grimentz, Saint-Luc and Vissoie merged into the new municipality of Anniviers. Category:Former municipalities of Valais Category:Villages in Valais
title: Saint-Jean, Switzerland
